title: The Ancient Mariner Recipe
full_text:
The Ancient Mariner Recipe
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
2 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
Crushed
ice
1
ounce
Demerara Rum
(not the 151-proof kind)
1
ounce
dark Jamaican rum
, such as Coruba
3/4
ounce
fresh
lime juice
1/2
ounce
fresh
grapefruit juice
1/2
ounce
simple syrup
1/4
ounce
Allspice Dram
Garnish:
lime wedge
,
mint sprig
Directions
Fill a double old fashioned glass with crushed ice, then add both rums, lime, grapefruit juice, simple syrup, and allspice dram. Stir gently, then garnish with a lime wedge and mint sprig.
Rum
